website_summaries.verdict: High-quality construction paired with a uniquely convenient design make this showerhead a hands-down winner.
pros: Powerful magnetic holder effortlessly draws and secures showerhead
Superior pressure with 6 easy-to-use spray settings
Metal hose is highly durable without sacrificing flexibility
Sleek and modern finish in your choice of chrome or brushed nickel
cons: Attaches a bit too close to the wall for some
A quality showerhead, but somewhat costly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, does not last
customer_reviews.text: For $79, I expected this product to last more than a year. The part that screws onto the pipe cracked and water squirted in all directions over my bathroom. Replacement parts aren’t available at Lowes, Home depot or amazon. Since it’s been a year, Amazon has washed its hands of the issue and I have to contact the manufacturer. However, looking at my invoice, the product was sold 3rd party, so I’m concerned Moen will dismiss me as well!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It's the worst shower head I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Did they even do any quality control testing on this item? It's the worst shower head I've ever owned. Awful water pressure. Contrary to the instructions, you will need plumbers tape, because it will leak. Magnet strength is sub-par at best. Plastic makes it look fairly cheap. Don't waste your money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Merk

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: flimsy magnet makes it difficult to make adjustments, disappointed with severe water pressure restriction compared to my homes original shower heads.
customer_reviews.author: T. Buckland

customer_reviews.title: With a little hacking, awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Water pressure is HORRIBLE! However, lots of youtube videos exist showing you how to remove water regulator which once removed makes this an awesome product! Larger than dimensions seemes to indicate, which was good, we wanted something big. We chose a hose tyoe model so we could have the ability to easily clean the shower and give our dog a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalez Family

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Showerhead I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the time it took to install, this is THE BEST home improvement I have made yet. It feels a little cheap, especially the pushbutton and the plastic part that screws onto the pipe, but we're a month in without issue. I initially installed using plumber's putty, but it leaked. Reinstalling with teflon tape fixed the leak. The magnet seemed gimmicky to me when I was thinking about ordering, but it's actually a really neat, convenient feature--sure beats fitting it into a cradle every time. Others have commented on the pressure regulator being over the top, but I left it installed and the pressure is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Reckinrod

customer_reviews.title: From Size to Water Pressure...Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Can't say I'm happy with this purchase. Another reviewer mentioned that the showerhead was bigger than anticipated, even though the measurements are right there in the description. I had a similar reaction; it's the size of a small frying pan. I also think, because it's bigger, it affects the water pressure, as that's not very good either (Yes, I did remove the restrictor, which was pretty easy to do with the right tools). I also didn't love the plastic attachment to the main pipe. So many things I didn't like/love about this, and it's not cheap! Unfortunately, "customer satisfaction" is not a reason that Amazon gives for a return so I guess I'll be using this for a little while...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOW PRESSURE, ;for a short person or children as it hits low
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the magnetic feature and good reviews. So disappointed. I like a shower head that is above me- not hits me mid chest. ( I am 5’6”) And the pressure was SO low. Best part was magnetic feature and brushed nickel finish. Returned and purchased High Pressure hand held by KAQINU for $18.99. That one does have high pressure and is much higher and more adjustable. I bought it even though it is chrome rather them brushed nickel, which I preferred. And I don’t miss the magnetic feature of the Moen- it’s very easy to get in & off. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Excellent showerhead for the money
customer_reviews.text: I didn't do the installation so I can't speak to that. What I can say as a user is that I enjoy this showerhead very much. The magnetic dock makes it very easy to remove and replace when you are in the shower. The button to press to move through the water patterns is conveniently placed on the handle. There are a couple of patterns that I'm not crazy about and wish there was a way to permanently exclude, but that would add a lot of money to what is a great showerhead. I also would have preferred for the hose to be a little shorter. Those are very minor annoyances. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MelonieB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, you won’t be sorry with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Stainless to match my 2nd Bathroom fixtures. I already had it in my Master Bathroom, but in Brushed Chrome. Really love this and all it’s different sprays. Touch button is very easy and it hangs like a dream and doesn’t slip or fall off. Great for using when cleaning the shower, makes the job much easier. I had a straight Rain shower head, but it took forever to get shampoo/cream rinse out of my hair and off the floor so I didn’t slip. I removed the flow restrictor with needle nose pliers. Takes me half the time to rinse my hair so I feel it evens out for water usage.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper 898

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shower head!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install; good water flow, and I love the push button feature. SO much easier than trying to turn the shower head to a different setting with wet, soapy fingers! The magnet is super strong; the shower head snaps right back into place when you hold it close to the magnetic dock. although this is chromed plastic, so was my last one, and the only reason I got rid of it after 15 years is because it was up so high I couldn’t reach the dang thing any more! I expect this one to last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: denden

customer_reviews.title: Solid Shower Head - Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality shower head for sure. Easy to install and went up quickly. The actual shower head itself is larger than expected and the water flow (even with the restrictor removed) is good but not great. We have excellent water pressure and our other shower heads provide adequate flow. Switching between the different modes finds the shower head slow to react, I suspect it is due to the size of the head, it takes some time to fill the different regions for the different modes. Hard to go wrong with Moen and their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: A lot of very good features here...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of shower heads and so far, this one is the best I have found. Price is reasonable and I am not expecting it to last forever. It's plastic, so don't bang it around. Pros: nice large shower head for decent coverage - no more freezing in a hot shower because the spray area is so small the magnetic system is perfect, no more wrestling to get the shower head out of the caddie great to be able to change the water flow with a button on the handle easy to remove the restrictor...sorry to say, but I'll shorten my shower time in favor of real water pressure Cons: only one...I wish it had a "mist" feature
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: WOW-this is beautiful. The installation was under 5 minutes, 3 easy steps, They do not even want you using tools! 2 small little leaks so we put in the 2 supplied washers and not a drop leaking. LOVE the button to shange settings- never thought of anything other than that awedul old spinning dial for settings and the magnet is the perfect amount of hold and ability to take off. We always had to shower heads now 1 does both! Ordered a 2nd one within 10 minutes of my son using the first one. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Best Shower Massager I have ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: I love a good shower. When my current shower massager broke I bought many units and could not find one that I liked. Then I found this one. The magnetic feature is simply fantastic. The spray pattern meets the bill and the push button change over from spray pattern to spray pattern is so easy. The hose has enough length to move the shower head anywhere you need it. I recommend you remove the water flow restricter plug before installing for a better shower time experience. It is very easy to do. Also had a piece missing in the unit and the customer service was fantastic they replaced it PDQ . Buy this unit you will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower head! No leaks! Strong magnet! Do NOT use plumbers tape and do NOT use a wrench!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to use in the shower after her ankle surgery because she can't stand up and put any weight on it. Just remove you old shower head and install this one HAND TIGHT ONLY! If you use a wrench you could crack the plastic and cause leaks. Also, do NOT use plumbers tape for the same reason! The directions clearly state to hand tighten only and not to use plumbers tape. We've been using it for over two months and it doesn't leak, the water pressure coming out of it is fine, and the shower head has not once fallen off the magnetic mount!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: ALL PLASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Other than being magnetic this is a bad value to money ratio. The product description makes this spund like a hravy duty metal showerhead. THIS IS ALL PLASTIC. The description also advertises the hose as metal, IT IS NOT. Unless you need the magnetic feature, I simply cannot reccomend it. There are METAL showerheads availabe at 1/3 the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: WOW this shower head is WONDERFUL. I bought it with my points from Amazon. IT'S WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!!!! I use to think that all shower heads are mostly the same, boy was I wrong. Easy to grip and the different sprays are great it has a magnet to hang the shower head so when you got soap in your eyes it's no problem finding the right spot to hang it up. It has a button you push to change the sprays so it's no twisting to find the massage anymore....
customer_reviews.author: Happygirl3

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, especially after removing the flow restrictor, which took all of 10 seconds with a small flat screwdriver. No leaks, no need for Teflon tape and no tools needed for installation. In fact, using wrench’s to install this may compress the gaskets making them lose their sealing function. I added an in-line shut off valve to save water while lathering up and what not. If the government wanted to regulate water usage they should have made it mandatory for manufacturers to include a shut-off on all fixtures, this coupled with a public service announcement campaign on how to use a shut off while showering... problem solved. Great shower head though. The different settings are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: nick tannehill

customer_reviews.title: The shower head is very adjustable - works great
customer_reviews.text: I was very favorably impressed with this shower head. My concern, based on a comment I had read, was that the spray would be aimed too far out toward the opposite end of the shower and not adjust to my somewhat shorter stature. There is a wide swivel range where the head connects to the pipe, so no problem, especially in combination with my ability to adjust the water pressure with the handle to spray just where I want it. The button switch to change sprays works great. There is plenty of water pressure as is for me. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Beautifully Designed
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to research my new shower head. I was even looking at dual shower heads, where you have the static head, and the wand. This one serves my purposes well, and the dual wand setup ended up unnecessary. The magnetic connection is the best to reconnect the wand, and it's so simple, they all should work like this. I gave it four stars because the water doesn't come out very well from the wand/head. It has multiple water settings, and only one or two out of the 6 work OK.
customer_reviews.author: Akhenatonio

customer_reviews.title: I do like the magnetic part
customer_reviews.text: The bigger shower head is bulkier than I thought it would be. Its ok, but I wish it had more pressure...and yes I dealt with the water flow thing that others posted about. I do like the magnetic part, it makes it easy to move the handle on and off. I like my shower head, but not sure I would choose this one again. At our old house we had a Delta in2ition and I liked that one better.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia R

customer_reviews.title: East to Install
customer_reviews.text: This shower head needs NO tools to install, the only tools you need are for the removal of your OLD one. Did not have to remove the water pressure reducer, works just right with it in, my water pressure is good. The spray would have probably been too strong if I had removed it. But was somewhat disappointed that for the price this shower head is all plastic but I suppose that is the price you pay for the Moen name and reputation for quality. The shower head is larger than in most other models but I found this to be an advantage...the coverage is better.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stelmach

customer_reviews.title: Great showerhead, a little spendy for plastic though
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am very happy with this showerhead. The button to change water spray works as designed and the magnet attaching showerhead to mount works flawlessly. It is super easy to install (5 mins max). The one criticism I have is that for a $60+ showerhead, I would expect it to have metal connecting parts (where showerhead attached to spout and hose connects to showerhead). Cheap plastic parts (that can easily break if overtightened or bumped/knocked) are the only reason I rate this as 4/5 stars. If the price were closer to the $30-40 price range, I would give a full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: If you want water pressure, remove the green-ringed restrictor
customer_reviews.text: 150% recommend removing the little green lined water flow restrictor. If you're going to pay $70+ for a shower head, then you can afford the couple extra bucks a month it'll add onto your water bill. The difference in water pressure is night and day with the restrictor removed. Plus, if you have to return it for any reason, just hold onto that piece. You can put the restrictor back in place pretty easily. I've had no issues with it in the couple months since I bought it. Magnet is nice and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N Ward

customer_reviews.title: Exremely Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this Moen shower head with the magnetic docking system. First of all, the price is great as well as the quality that comes with the Moen name. The magnetic docking system is strong and secure but also easy to remove when you're ready to use it. I was shocked at how quickly my husband had it installed! I purchased it to make giving our 45 lb. dog easier during the rinsing process. It works perfectly and having the 6 settings offered a spraying option that's not overpowering and doesn't make her more nervous or anxious. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: T. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small showers
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to search to find a showerhead that wouldn’t squirt out over the top of our small shower in our bathroom for guests. This is perfect you can angle the head down adjust to where it sprays! Also it’s nice to be able to pull it off of the anchor and clean the shower with it. Love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gaemmi

customer_reviews.title: Great feature with magnetic mount, would like more pressure
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic head attachment is so much more convenient than similar products on the market - you do not have to fight with disconnecting sometimes spraying in unintentional directions. Attachment is easy off and easy on in a split second; however, there is some limitation in adjusting the stationary position. The priority for us is the pressure level and we were looking for a stronger pressure. We removed the screen attachment but it is still just shy of the pressure we were hoping for. We will keep this product but will continue to look for one more in line with our original search and move this to the guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: As most reviewers stated it does leak; however, ...
customer_reviews.text: As most reviewers stated it does leak; however, I will see if some pipe tape will help stop it. The bigger issue is the water pressure. I figured maybe there was a reason why only some people complained. The water pressure is very low in comparison to the one that I removed. I don't think it has anything to do with the leak because the old one had been leaking as well. I will try to make due until I get my bathroom remodeled but the flow is most likely too weak to effectively rinse shampoo out of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Gifted

customer_reviews.title: Great Pressure, Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I love this new shower head! The magnet attachment works great and my husband installed it in under half an hour. We had no problems with the amount of water pressure so we did not take out the restrictors like other reviewers have mentions they have done. The only part I am not happy about it that it is not as easy to adjust the direction of the shower head. You have to grab the base and move it because when you grab the head it comes off the magnet attachment (as it was meant to do).
customer_reviews.author: christopher caron

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the preinstalled washer its GARBAGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: What should be a 5 minutes install...turn into a 50 minutes install. @#$%& (bad word). The preinstalled washer with the screen built in it is GARBAGE! Once install to my shower pipe head it crumbles and cause it to leak. No matter how i straighten it up once i wrench onto my shower pipe it leaks. I had to drive out to Home Depot and look for a thicker stronger washer that won't crumbled. Problem solved wasted time and gas because Moen wanted to save a couple pennies with a sub par washer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Y.

customer_reviews.title: Just works great!
customer_reviews.text: Hey you, your considering buying this gadget .... ??? ... totally worth it. Its has a magnetic interface, one part on the shower head, the other on the water pipe hookup. I love the button on the shower head, lets you change to different spray configurations, just wonderful! Love it! Also great water flow! I removed the little water regulator thingy per another persons review here at Amazon. It has so much throughput I kind of which I didn't remove the water reducer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you can find better
customer_reviews.text: This is ok, water is slower, different settings no big deal nothing great, my biggest pet peeve is the color or the hose, it is sold as a SS but the hose is chrome. I called the MOEN and explained to them and asked me to send out a SS hose and they sent out another chrome hose. so in reality their parts do not match in color, very disappointed and bad on their part.
customer_reviews.author: LiSA

customer_reviews.title: great shower!
customer_reviews.text: installed these in new home Feb. 2020 for shower variety and extension capability. Very easy to use by hand and very secure when replaced, really like the ease of Magnitrix shower head removal and replacement. Be aware that hose is chrome, device is plastic, and hose is not long enough to stretch out to end of bathtub but tub. Overall very pleased with purchase and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Use
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand a lot of reviews stating this was cheaply made. I suppose if you pull really hard the plastic section could back... I don't plan on using it to catch me when I fall, so I should be fine. It was very easy to install. (Thanks to those who mentioned not to used thread tape.) I have used it for a couple months now and it works as you would expect. I removed the flow restrictor to maximize pressure, which is good. My only complaint is I can't get it to completely shut-off. Otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Okay listen up y’all. This is by far the easiest set up. I am 63 years old & we both are DIYers. Over the years all the ones in the past was using the tapes and different tools. Well now it’s a thing of the past with this!! Literally took less than 2 minutes to remove the original shower head and put this one on. Works like a charm. Anyone who says there’s broke. They dropped it. Absolutely the best!! We are buying more. So easy and works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower head. I have been using it for over a year. I removed the water suppressor because most comments said to. It made it too powerful so I recently purchased the shower head again. I wish I would have tried it first because it is better with the suppressor. Well lesson learned. The magnet holds the head securly. Even buying it twice it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Cai

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and convenient, but lower flow
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller shower head before this one and the water pressure was great. However, with this one, the water doesn't come out as hard. A couple of settings have a strong stream, but they're not the kind you would use to shower regularly. Aside from that, it's a good shower head. It hangs a little low, so you lose 2-3 inches of height, but you can tilt it up. The magnetic attachment feature is great and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sam B

customer_reviews.title: Huge upgrade over original heads. Remove the restrictor if you want just a bit more.
customer_reviews.text: This was great, but removing the flow restrictor changes the game completely. I definitely feel like it was sufficient flow before, but I can never go back after removing it. Otherwise, the magnetix stuff is genius. It's so convenient and easy to use without having to worry about finding the clips for the detachable heads. Great coverage and nice switching from the stock junk that comes with a home. No leaks or any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice item... would be nice if it were all one color
customer_reviews.text: All in all, a nice item... some very minor gripes. All of these shower heads seem a bit pricey... so no difference here. Thought the hose would be metal exterior... plastic (so a bit of curl to get out). Not obvious, but the part that attaches to your existing pipe is made of gray plastic... would have been nice if it matched the brushed nickel of the shower head. Magnetic attachment is very strong, no issue there.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Knystautas

customer_reviews.title: Just needs an on off control
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Feels a little larger than I thought. The only issue I have is it is missing an on/off control. When I need to apply soap or hang it to rinse down tub shower, I cannot unless I turn off supply. We still have the grandfathered 3 control setup. Else I appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: The product works!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and a nice wide stay pattern. No problem with leaks or cracked plastic parts as reported by others. I suspect the parts in question were over tightened. Makes cleaning our walk in shower much easier too. So far, it is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Old Dutch

customer_reviews.title: The magnet makes it an absolute winner
customer_reviews.text: To be able to detach the showerhead and reattach it from the magnetic docking system and a fantastic feature. Instead of having to pull it out of a plastic bracket you just pull it off the magnet. One of my most favorite products that I have bought on here. P.S. There is also a small button you can push on the showerhead to get a small but powerful strong jet of water for deep or hard to clean areas
customer_reviews.author: Ozark DC9

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works Great. The Magnet head is super. Bought another mounting to use on the Seat to hold the head away from the mount. The button on the handle changes the spay nozzle and speed of water. We have a large shower with the seat on the furtherest away from the water control. Wish it had an on and off button to turn off the water from shower head. Great Product.!..
customer_reviews.author: James McDonald

customer_reviews.title: It's a Moen product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and looks solid. Very easy to install. I removed the water regulator and the water flow is awesome. The magnet design allows my family members who are short to comfortably detach the shower head with ease. My only complaint is that the hose ends are made of plastic and in my experience, those are the parts that will break and leak. Satisfied so far. I tried to save money by buying the off brands that had a lots of reviews but ended up returning them because the water flow was bad or the shower was too noisy.
customer_reviews.author: fansntt

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure. Needs better plastic. Still great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head. For those complaining of water pressure should bathe with a pressure cleaner if they aren’t happy with this. I have an older house and the pressure is just fine. As far as the quality some parts are pretty cheap plastic and if you aren’t careful you will break it. I used plumbers tape and I had no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe Portucasa

customer_reviews.title: Good Handheld Shower Head But Lousy Massage Settings
customer_reviews.text: The unit was very easy to install and has a very nice water output for normal showering. The issue is that there are supposed to be 6 massage settings that are operated by cycling through with the switch on the head. The box even shows and describes the 6 settings. The problem is that the button cycles through them in a random order and the massage isn't one! Also the head is 5.5" and may be to big for many users. I suggest one of the smaller heads.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Caputo

customer_reviews.title: If you're on a well
customer_reviews.text: If you're on a well (like me) and have lower pressure than typical city pressures, you may not like this... Also, take note that since this model has a magnetic 'hold' instead of a 'C' type shower 'hold' one should know that you're going to lose 4"-5" of height based on where the attach point is... Not a bad unit, just something to note.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4x4 foot stall, and took out the restrictor as a given. It was too much, pinned is to the wall like Kramer! Put the restrictor,minus put the O ring, back in. It's still good pressure, maybe too much still. Will continue to test. Push button change is excellent. Easy to clean all body parts. Just what the booty wanted! Magnet fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Check the spray range before install
customer_reviews.text: The major issue is the shape of the head prevents its mobility when used as a shower head. You almost need a longer shower pipe, or maybe have it installed higher up. This means the water stream would hit the chest only of an average adult. It works ok because we installed it in the bathroom used primarily by children. I also worry that the magnet function will stop working in the future , but the magnet works perfectly and has lovely spray options.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends has this in his house and I always loved taking a shower there. Needless to say, I had to get my own. I am so happy with it. I love it so much. It really feels like a waterfall. The removable shower head is magnetic to boot which is so convenient...not only to rinse off but when you have clean those shower walls! lol. I do not think that you will be disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Magnet feature is a big plus, but hand held is slippery to grasp when showering.
customer_reviews.text: We managed to replace our existing shower head with this new one without too much effort. My husband uses the hand held feature while showering on a bench. He indicates that it is very difficult to keep a grasp on it while showering because the handle gets slippery. We don’t want to resort to velcro but we might have to. Some type of texture on the handle would be helpful. Having the magnet is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: It's mostly plastic, but still a nice shower head
customer_reviews.text: The hose is metal, but the shower head itself is plastic. I would not have expected that from Moen, but none the less, it is a nice big shower head. My shower is mounted very high on the wall, so the magnetic attachment was exactly what I needed. I wouldn't be able to reach the typical kind where you have to reach over the dock and slide the hose into the holder.
customer_reviews.author: A. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It leaks from the button where you push to change the setting of the water.... Doesn't cause much problem in regards to using it, but it's just annoying to see.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnetic Shower ead.
customer_reviews.text: The install was easy but the water stream was VERY weak. I removed the flow restrictor and now I am 100% satisfied. Reduced flow shower heads are OK for small sized shower equipment. However, with the multiple big ports on this head water just dribbles out. Removing the blue restrictor in the wand allowed for an invigorating shower experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tom 1948

customer_reviews.title: I love my new shower head
customer_reviews.text: I always had a hard time removing the showerhead from the base, because of my short stature. This showerhead is amazing. I just reach up and grab it, then place it against the magnet when I'm done. The magnet pulls the showerhead into place, each time. It's so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Form and mostly function.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it BUT the part where it has no pause feature. Bought this style to make cleaning the shower and washing dog in winter easier, but the lack of a pause feature sucks. Got an adapter that can do that, but also have a filter because my city water is so bad so between these things the shower head hangs really low.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: There are only six spray settings but I can live with that. It looks nice and has a great magnet but it cannot be adjust to aim anywhere but straight so when you enter the shower you need to make sure you don't splash into bathroom before you pull the curtain shut. The unit has a flex hose that gets in the way if you have a shower caddy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for the money
customer_reviews.text: I paid more for this shower head than any other I have ever owned. It is horrible when it comes to the massage settings. The regular spray is much more powerful then the massage. I absolutely hate this shower head and if I had not paid so much for it I would have just trashed it and bought another cheap one, at least the massage setting would feel like more than a trickle.
customer_reviews.author: Lisha

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive, not ideal.
customer_reviews.text: Advantages: relatively convenient installation, multiple mode switching, large magnetic attraction. Disadvantages: expensive and too much plastic. There is no white waterproof tape for delivery, I used the old one to prevent water leakage. The angle can be adjusted, but because it is too heavy, the carrying capacity is poor.
customer_reviews.author: shy

customer_reviews.title: After a year it stopped changing spray patterns
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a while. After a year it stopped changing spray patterns. Tried cleaning with vinegar but still won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Good water pressure. Nice magnetic mount.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing the unit and had my 1st shower. Works very well. I removed the restrictor fiting as advised by a previous reviewer Iit seems to have more pressure than my original shower head. I enjoy the easy magnetic mount. And of course this is a Moen product so it has a good guarantee and quality customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SteveH

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey for average product
customer_reviews.text: This product is average quality, probably not worth the price tag. I feel the plastic fittings for the hose and also the plastic shower arm that holds the shower head should've been metal. Also the shower head click button is a nice feature switching between different settings, would've been nice to have a shut off feature as well. Would come in handy when giving a child a bath or even a pet.
customer_reviews.author: Alessio Infante

customer_reviews.title: Happy clean grandchild!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t removed it so not sure about that. We put it in, and hubby ran it, said it was fine. Loved the look! Granddaughter came over a week later and couldn’t wait to get downstairs to tell us how wonderful her shower was! She said it was the best shower she every had! It has the stamp of approval of a very picky 12 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Shesalulu

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: We had a Moen Magnetix in a condo we rent and liked it so much we ordered another for home. It was well packaged, arrive as promised and was easy to install. We tried it first as delivered but found the fow was too light, so removed the restrictor and it now works well. The push buttons change the flow pattern easily and the magnetic attachment is much better than the normal holder. Recommended and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Firewire

customer_reviews.title: NO OFF SETTING!
customer_reviews.text: I **thought** that the button shown in the pic was on/off, as my previous showerhead had. Very disappointed to discover its purpose is to move between each flow setting. I almost bought 2 the 1st time, but glad now I didn't. This one now goes in the guest bathroom when I find one with the on/off I am looking for
customer_reviews.author: Skip Safford

customer_reviews.title: Water pressure
customer_reviews.text: The low water pressure others comment on is not a problem if you go to the high pressure spray. I like the gentle large spray which feels like a gentle rainfall. High pressure for rinsing hair. Great customer service reviews meant I wasn’t taking a chance. They can stand behind a good product. Wasn’t able to load picture.
customer_reviews.author: KayOzz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, durable, hearty product
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product that is easy to use and easy to install. It works via magnet and that takes a little getting used to. My other showerhead snapped into place, and I am not used to just letting go and having the magnet grasp it. One can tell just by touching it that it is a very durable hearty product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful functional shower head
customer_reviews.text: Perfect show head for our new shower! Looks great and love the button functionality! Only reason for 4 stars is I wish there was some way to improve the water pressure a bit, already tried taking out the green restrictor but not much difference.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: The head is too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the convenience of shower head/hand held. The head is too heavy. My wife can hardly handle it with a soapy hand. It slipped out of my hand and swung free several time as I was redocking. It could easily have smashed the glass shower enclosure. The shower patterns are good. Installation is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: readsalot

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is wonderful. I love the carious spray patterns that are available but most of all, I love the magnetic attaching point. Since I am less that 5 feet tall, all I need to do is get the head close to the magnet and it attaches itself where it belongs. GREAT feature!!! If I ever move again, it will go with me.
customer_reviews.author: Gini

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but poor implementation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a showerhead that developed a crack on the main housing that connects the wall. I was excited about the ease of the magnetic attachment. My shower is older and the hose connection is lower. The way this sits, it is too low to hit anything other than my chest. The base is also not strong enough to hold up the magnet and showerhead so it just drops down.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this item. Unlike other comments regarding no teflon tape necessary I found I needed it. I didn't want to overtighten because it's plastic. I also found there is a need to remove the flow restrictor. Easy enough to get directions from YouTube. I've liked the Moen brand for their warranty and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: gen garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but I’m quite impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product. Yes, it’s cheap plastic but works amazingly well and looks wonderful. I followed the hack other reviewers posted to increase the water pressure. Thanks for the epic tip! My only concern is that the magnet that holds the shower head will eventually rust due to excessive exposure to water, and potentially low quality waterproof coating. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: ⁠

customer_reviews.title: Remove the water restriction (easy) and this is a fine shower head
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for another device that had the hose part mounted to the wall. We had our shower resurfaced and didn't want to stick things to the wall. The magnet is very powerful and easy. Remove the water restriction device (easy) and this is a fine shower head with lots of pressure and options.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Once I removed the water flow restrictor, shower pressure is fine. Sits a little low, and interferes with my toiletries caddy that hangs on the water pipe coming from the wall. Plastic construction is a minor disappointment, but I like it the push button flow changer seems nice. This is only the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with arthritic hands
customer_reviews.text: We had another type of handheld but is was getting to the point I didn't have the strength in my hands to turn the overhead diverter knob to switch from showerhead to hand held. This new one doesn't have to be switched; it's all in one. So glad we bought it. Love the magnetic part too, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the magnetic attachment feature. I am only 5' tall and I didn't like the previous ones I have used because they were hard to get down and back. Also love the button feature to change the different the different sprays. Because of the reviews I read I had the water regulator removed before it was installed. The pressure is great. I have a bad back and neck and it feels so good just having the hot water go on it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Houser

customer_reviews.title: Nice showerhead
customer_reviews.text: I like the water patterns on this showerhead. The head comes off the magnet easily and is very easily put back in place. I'm not a plumber but I installed it without problems. Very easy to change water patterns by pressing a button on the showerhead. I'm glad I bought this showerhead.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Landon

customer_reviews.title: Docking feature works great
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic docking feature is great for my husband who has limited dexterity. He had trouble with our conventional handheld shower head. A little pricey but it has a good strong magnet, and ease of use is worth the extra cost. The only disadvantage is that none of the settings deliver very forceful water pressure. That's why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Spyder Guy and Briar Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good value with plenty of pressure
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I recently remodeled both bathrooms and needed new shower heads. I bought a two head model from a retail store and was unimpressed with it. A relative recommended this one, so I ordered it from Amazon for the master bath and am very happy with the water pressure and spray options.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: connector piece cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: great great looking shower head, all 6 jet functions work great. only deducted a star because of cheap and badly manufactured plastic pipe connector.
customer_reviews.author: WaterFrog

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this shower head
customer_reviews.text: There’s really nothing I don’t like about this shower head, the magnetic is strong but still removes easily, the one button to change water cycle is very convenient and the brushed finish is very attractive
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: not so durable
customer_reviews.text: This broke after only 5 months of use. the hose near the showerhead broke spraying water all over the tub. Looks like the inner tube/hose busted open like a popped balloon. I don't know if it's because the showerhead is too heavy for the tubing? The showerhead is heavy and my first thought was that the magnet attachment wouldn't last, but nope it was the tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Like all Moen, it works well
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a contractor-grade shower head because we needed a handheld with multiple spray settings. I read the instructions, installed the included washers and screwed it on. It gives excellent water flow, with a variety of settings, and best of all, it does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: orion1113

customer_reviews.title: Terrible water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shower head with terrible water pressure. My previous shower head allowed for amazing pressure, this is maybe just too restricted. Not sure what the issue is, was able to contact Moen directly and they sent me a new one of the same in case it was just defective, but it is not any better. Extremely disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and awesome!  Great for seniors.
customer_reviews.text: The best shower head I have ever purchased. Having the magnetic shower head and push button control makes it’s extremely easy to use. Purchased one for my elderly mother who was having trouble hooking the detached head and back into place, along with changing the control. This has helped her more with her independence than imagined. Like how it worked so much and I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: KeneG

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, read teh description carefully
customer_reviews.text: Install a snap, 2 mins max. Water flow terrific. But, be aware, only thing "chrome" about it is the color - this is a plastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the plumbing in the wall is properly anchored.
customer_reviews.text: My new house had a crap shower head in the guest bath, I switched it out for this one. I love it! I'm sure my guests will too. The only problem I had is the previous owners didn't bother to properly anchor the water lines. Once that was taken care of everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: MW Hauser

customer_reviews.title: A great shower head, very functional, feels superior.
customer_reviews.text: The best shower head I have ever used. It's sturdy and has stood the test of time in a face paced life. Functions for both long or short showers, What that means is most apartments have 20-30 gallon water heaters and this items water disperse ratio must be pretty good because where other heads I tried drained the hot water in 10 minutes or less, this one keeps going.
customer_reviews.author: MWMullens

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The shower head does exactly what it markets. It was very easy to install, the water pressure is pretty good YMMV. The finish is basic hard plastic, you get what you pay for. The magnet is very strong and it is easy to remove the shower head. The shower head is on the heavy side but overtime you will get used to it. The shower setting button is kind of placed in a bad area because I accidentally press it when I bring the head down. Overall, it is a good shower head that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: philly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Shower-head
customer_reviews.text: Overall we love this shower-head. The magnetix feature is fantastic. Installation is also easy but just like the other reviews state, I did have to use a wrench and teflon tape to get the fittings to seal completely. I also removed the flow restrictor prior to installing ( just pulls right out with a pair of needle nose pliers), based on comments in other reviews, and the pressure is perfect. Took the old one down and had the new one installed in less than 30 minutes, very easy to install. The push button adjustment is fantastic and makes it easy to adjust with only one hand. Glad we chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower accessory.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. This is the third one (3 bathrooms). They work like a regular shower head but can lift for wand. Magnet is great. I had another brand that you had to push onto a holder and broke off. This is easy and pretty cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: TazCC

customer_reviews.title: Plastic connector is a no go
customer_reviews.text: Plastic connector developed a crack on the 4th day of use. Had to return. Bought a metal one and very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Spa like Shower Spray
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my elderly mom a few years ago She found it easy to use & provides great shower spray We bought ours recently for master bathroom Love the various sprays plus easy easy easy removing & replacing the sprayer for concentrated spray 💕
customer_reviews.author: galliongal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to return to the wall.  Not so easy to change the direction of the water.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the magnet feature. I am a bit short to reach and as long as I get the shower head close to the magnet it goes right into place without my struggling to reach. With my old shower head I could grab the end and adjust the direction of the water. When I try this with the magnet shower head, the shower head comes off. Now, I have to tiptoe to move the plastic price behind the showerhead to change the direction of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Christien Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Good value - recommend. Replaced Waterpic shower head that was old and worn out. It will lower the height of your shower! WOuld be nice to have a extender that goes up to avoid losing those precious inches in showers where plumber was short!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Love the magnet holder, but ......
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and the magnet device that holds the faucet is great. My problem was the water pressure was limited because of a device within the pipe. I wanted more water pressure, so I used needle-nose pliers to remove the limiting washer. Now I'm fine with it and in fact love to take showers.
customer_reviews.author: Rogfit229

customer_reviews.title: Large head with lots of function and pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice size and looks great. I had issues with pressure on a rain head and this is big enough to replace and has great pressure. Literally screw it in and away you go. Magnet is strong, hose would be nicer if it was chrome also but great choice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Great flow, easy to install, works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I install this brand with the magnetic hold in every apartment I rent. They are invaluable in small stall showers, you can clean yourself and your shower easily. The magnetic hold is awesome - been working for over 2 years just fine. Adjustable spray patterns are easy to change. Glow is great. Will never live without a Moen handheld shower again.
customer_reviews.author: mandmplain

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated buying this but I love it I may buy another for my vacation home. Easy to install. Magnet is strong but east to pull nozzle down for hand held use. I am short and always struggled getting nozzle down and up on those regular arm clamps. This is awesome and shower head is big with strong flow.
customer_reviews.author: eeyore1218

product_meta.title: Moen 26112SRN Engage Magnetix Six-Function 5.5-Inch Handheld Showerhead with Magnetic Docking System, Spot Resist Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description: Color:Spot Resist Brushed Nickel| Style:ShowerheadInspired by patterns found in nature, the Engage Magnetix Showerhead offers a distinctive design which is at home in any decor. Chrome finish is highly reflective for a mirror-like look that works with any decorating style. Large 5.5 inch diameter spray head hand shower for maximum coverage. Customize your shower at the push of a button by clicking through six optimized settings. Magnetix docking allows for easy release and return with magnetic docking system, even with you eyes closed. This showerhead always docks facing forward to avoid exterior splashing outside your shower. Includes a kink-free metal hose that extends reach and flexibility.
feature_bullets: SPOT RESISTANT: Spot Resist Nickel finish resists fingerprints and water spots for a cleaner looking bath
MAGNETIC BASE: The magnetic docking system allows you to easily detach and use as a handheld shower head or effortlessly replace it to dock with the snap of a magnet
CUSTOMIZE YOUR SHOWER: Multiple distinct shower settings gives flexibility and variety
FLEXIBLE: Features a kink-free metal hose that extends reach and flexibility
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,743 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
